t: Amazon Brand Registry roles, explained
s: Rights Owner: the trademark owner or their employee who is authorized to report violations. Users with this role have access to the Report a Violation tool and listing benefits. Registered Agent: a third party who is authorized by the Rights Owner to report violations using Brand Registry tools.
